text: I think you could use the google maps api geocode / look up by their current location to get their zip code
"To get your pricing, make sure to allow us to use your location"
would take significantly less to implement
that’s a good option too. My only fear is people’s habitual answer to that location prompt

I did some looking into the user experience of that. And I don’t have it handy on me but making them click a button to bring the prompt up generally increases the chances 75% or something that they except the location. So basically on your pages you would say click for price we need to know your ZIP Code type in your ZIP Code or click this button to automatically find your ZIP Code out￼
And then you store that in local storage so it will persist across pages￼
Or you could do a bunch of things with it once you have it￼
But you are correct nobody hits yes all the time I think I click no most the time and then have to refresh I’m like oh no I need to look up my address right now￼
Sorry this was all y’all to text
